description.en: Create beautiful, natural-looking lip color enhancement
description.vi: Tạo màu môi tự nhiên và quyến rũ

subtitle: Natural Lip Enhancement Specialist
introduction: Learn the art of lip blushing to create natural, enhanced lip color. This course covers color selection, lip anatomy, numbing techniques, and how to achieve symmetrical, beautiful results.

curriculum.name: Lip Anatomy & Safety
curriculum.description: Understanding lip structure, nerve locations, and safety protocols

curriculum.name: Color Theory for Lips
curriculum.description: Neutralizing techniques and custom color mixing

curriculum.name: Application Techniques
curriculum.description: Various lip techniques including full lip and gradient lip

curriculum.name: Client Management
curriculum.description: Consultation, aftercare, and managing client expectations
